author: thebrickbuster
title: The Best Rig
review:
This model is in my top ten sets, my best model team set by far.
Awsome detail on the truck and trailer.
The build time was fun.
Lots of wheels.
A good set to help you learn how to get great vehicle building ideas.
The only draw back was the jump jet. Possibly could have been more detailed.
Overall great value for money(lots of elements) fun, complex set.
